topics.body: The reason I say the movement's dead is because it's basically the zero hour of retard on both sides of the sociopolitical spectrum. Also, when a movement loses momentum and is not as popular as it once was, that is a reasonable sign that the movement is dying. By the way, don't preach about ethics when you guys have the basic rundown of scumbags at times. King of /Pol/ was a holocaust denier, Aurini (the guy making the Sarkeesian effect documentary) is a self-proclaimed "race-realist" (racist) and genuine misogynist, like to a point where even you wouldn't disagree, InternetAristocrat was a right-wing moron and a dick who couldn't handle his own popularity, Sargon of Akkad's just a retard (he's basically King of /Pol/ without the holocaust denial), 8Chan was a site with several pedo boards which hosted CP and the creator of the site said he kept it up because it gave his site popularity... I'm sorry, don't preach to me about ethics. Even if you succeeded with Gawker, what's the end result? The lose a few advertisers. Woopty do. I guess no one in game reviews understands the inherent issue with objectivity and how it's technically an impossibility as well. Oh, and if you think I'm saying the feminists have been any better, you're wrong, this coming from a feminist, most of them have been fucking retards and made their own side look stupid. Really, it's just a circle-jerk of a bunch of losers trying too hard.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ea74156368720f781d0000#post_54ea74156368720f781d0000
I hope you are aware that Anita and Brianna are frauds lairs, Zoe Quinn is a W, and Gamerghazi was the one who tried to frame 8Chan by anonymously posting CP onto that site, they also sabotaged charities and doxxed people just for not agreeing with them.

Yes, we have bad apples on our side. But we don't claim to be perfect. The worst people in the world tend to be those who claim to be such.

We might not hate you for your stance. But I assure you, the other side will hate you and anyone else for just for being in a position other than their own. Ultimately, their "support us or else" ideology will be their downfall.

They even attacked women who disagree with the SOCJUS's  deranged views. If that isn't irony, hypocrisy, and misogyny, I don't know what is.
